title: Probability
text: The probability of getiting a footwear advertisement is $$\frac{29}{192}$$, which is around 15%. Let's say that highly probable is higher than 50%.

title: Probability Distribution Function
text: We can use Geometric PDF function on the calculator to find the probability that there are $$20$$ foot wear advertisements in our sample. Set $$p$$ to the probability that the advertisement is a footwear advertisement, and X to our desired random variable value, $$20$$.
